title: Riot Plz Explain?

embed.description: Hiding amongst the specters haunting the Black Mist are surprises both new and newly returned from Harrowing past. From October 24 to November 4, a host of deals and offers will be up for reaping: In an unprecedented phantasmic phenomenon, a group of skins' regular prices are reduced for six hours before resetting in favor of a new slate of skins.

body:
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/haunted-hoard-harrowing-sale

I would really love to know why the NA server got this sale and the Oceania server didn't. To me this is just even more evidence that Riot doesnt really care at all about the OCE server, first we had to pay for our server skin that EVERY OTHER SERVER GOT FOR FREE, and now this, as someone who has played since S1 this is just really disappointing
